title: mygeekchain
author: mygeekchain
content: Are you in search of a reliable Bitcoin mining pool? Look no further! Let me introduce you to dpool Mining Pool, where we strive to provide you with a secure, stable, and cost-effective mining experience, maximizing your profits.First and foremost, security is our top priority. dpool Mining Pool utilizes advanced security technology to safeguard your assets and personal information from any threats. We closely monitor the pool's operations to ensure maximum security. With us, you can mine with peace of mind, free from security concerns.Next, stability is our core value. Equipped with high-performance server architecture and a professional technical team, dpool Mining Pool guarantees high availability at all times. Whether it's network congestion or hardware failures, we can swiftly respond and ensure uninterrupted mining, making your profits more stable.Most importantly, our fees are incredibly low, saving you substantial costs. dpool Mining Pool offers competitive fee rates for mining services. We understand the impact of fees on your profits, which is why we strive to maintain the lowest fee levels, allowing you to enjoy more earnings during your mining journey.Moreover, we provide 24/7 customer service and technical support, ready to address your inquiries and resolve any issues you may encounter. No matter the mining challenges you face, we are committed to assisting you every step of the way.For our VIP clients, we offer flexible customization services. We recognize that each client's needs are unique, and we are willing to collaborate with you to provide personalized solutions tailored to your specific circumstances, ensuring utmost satisfaction and profitability.At dpool Mining Pool, we prioritize security, stability, and low costs, delivering exceptional mining services. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced miner, we cater to all your needs. Join dpool Mining Pool and let's forge a brighter future in the world of mining!Register now and embark on your dpool Mining Pool journey! Experience a safer, more stable, and cost-effective mining experience. Start realizing your ultimate profits today!http://www.dpool.me/service@dpool.top

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: mygeekchain on July 25, 2023, 06:12:10 PMAt dpool Mining Pool, we prioritize security, stability, and low costsWhat low cost? I checked your website and it says 3% fees for BTC mining, is just the average, in fact, a few other well-established pools charge 2.5% for PPS+/FPPS, so in regards to fees you are not doing much better than the average.Also, with only 1365.27 PH/s, you get on average a block every 3 days, so how do your daily payouts happen? how much are your reserves? what happens when your luck hits 500% and you can't find a block for 2 weeks or so?

comments.author: Toasteata
comments.body: Do you know if pools can confirm particular transactions? I have a stuck transaction I'm hoping to get help with.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Current bitcoin allows RBF.Your transaction is 'stuck' coz you didn't pay enough.Increase the fee.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: Toasteata on August 09, 2023, 01:59:12 PMDo you know if pools can confirm particular transactions? I have a stuck transaction I'm hoping to get help with. If RBF is not an option and the amount you sent is somewhat big, you would have to use a service like "BTC Transaction Accelerator" offered by Viabtc, those services are way too overpriced and not worth it for small transactions, the current fees for high priority is 29 sats/Vbyte, it's above the "usual", if yours is 2-3 sats and you are not in a rush, just wait a few more days, probably around the weekend.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: As I said, current bitcoin allows RBF- and stated without exception i.e. you can RBF your transaction.
